name: MYC_CONVO_ABT_REFERRALS
description: Referrals associated with the MyChart message conversation.

columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: This is the referral that this conversation is about.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: This is the authorization request that this conversation is about.

columns.name: INFO_REQ_CSN_ID
columns.description: This is the Information Request that this conversation is about.
